column4: how can you tell that "reiserfs is gonna die"? i wouldn't say that
the head of the project is in jail and will probably be executed

don't be stupid and don't say such things in this channel. afaik there hasn't even be a trial yet - go to #ubuntu-offtopic if you want to discuss this, and if you want to advice against reiserfs for technical reasons, fine, but keep everything else in #ubuntu-offtopic
I really wasn't trying to start a flamewar
